softwareSystems.name: Mainframe School System
softwareSystems.description: Stores all of the core information about students, teachers, the school itself, etc.

softwareSystems.name: E-mail System
softwareSystems.description: The internal Microsoft Exchange e-mail system.

softwareSystems.name: Internet Knowledge Navigator System
softwareSystems.description: Allows customers to view information about their knowledge navigator, and view exercises.

containers.name: Mobile App
containers.description: Provides a limited subset of the Internet Knowledge Navigator functionality to customers via their mobile device.

containers.name: Web Application
containers.description: Delivers the static content and the Internet Knowledge Navigator single page application.

relationships.description: Delivers to the customer's web browser

containers.name: API Application
containers.description: Provides Internet Knowledge Navigator functionality via a JSON/HTTPS API.

components.name: Mainframe School System Facade
components.description: A facade onto the mainframe School system.

components.name: Sign In Controller
components.description: Allows users to sign in to the Internet Knowledge Navigator System.

components.name: Security Component
components.description: Provides functionality related to signing in, changing passwords, etc.

components.name: Accounts Summary Controller
components.description: Provides customers with a summary of their Knowledge Navigator accounts.

components.name: Reset Password Controller
components.description: Allows users to reset their passwords with a single use URL.

containers.name: Single-Page Application
containers.description: Provides all of the Knowledge Navigator functionality to customers via their web browser.

containers.name: Database
containers.description: Stores user registration information, hashed authentication credentials, access logs, etc.
